data.title: Turner Meanings in English, Popularity, Origin
data.meta_description: Turner is a Christian English baby unisex name. Its meaning is "Lathe Worker". Turner name origin is English. , Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi
data.text:
Turner Name Meaning in English

What does the name Turner mean? What is the meaning of the name Turner, lucky number, lucky stone, origin and religion.

Turner Name Meaning. English and Scottish: occupational name for a maker of objects of wood, metal, or bone by turning on a lathe, from Anglo-Norman French torner (Old French tornier, Latin tornarius, a derivative of tornus 'lathe').

Turner Name Meaning, Origin & Details

Meaning: Lathe worker Details: Surname given to a carpenter or lathe worker. From Norman French word torner means "lathe worker". Turner is also a Jewish surname used by families with ancestral connections to Turnow, a city in Spain. Gender: For both boy and girl, unisex, transgender, neutral gender Origin: English Religion: Christian Suitable for: Unisex / Gender neutral Hardness: Medium hard to pronounce Uniqueness: It is a common name Short & Easy: Not very short Syllables: 6 Letters and 1 Words

Turner Name Lucky Number 6

Turner Name Numerology And Personality

Turner has the numerology 6. The gender of this name Turner is Unisex. These people are very good at keeping a nice balance between everything. They do not really over do anything rather they know how do they need to keep limits in everything.

Those who have numerology 6 are thought to be one of the most mature people because they are extremely responsible for their things and they are also very protective of the people around them. The religion is christian.

The meaning of this name is Lathe worker.These are people who believe that they can only move forward in their lives if they have sympathy in their hearts and that is how they believe in nurturing. They are known to be the most sympathetic and kind towards the people around them no matter if they know them personally or not.
